column2: location=East of the [[Misty Mountains]], south-east of [[Gundabad

column1: The '''Langwell''' was one of the two rivers, along with [[Greylin]], that met in the northern [[Vales of Anduin
column2: Vale of Anduin]] to form the beginnings of the [[Anduin]] River. The Langwell flowed east from the Misty Mountains.<ref>{{UT
1977}} [[Frumgar]] led the [[Éothéod]] from the middle to the upper part of the Vale of Anduin,<ref name="TA">{{App
column3: TA}}</ref> to escape from the growing shadow of [[Dol Guldur]] and to take advantage of the fall of [[Angmar]] in {{TA
column6: Cirion}}, note 19</ref> Upon their arrival they built their capital city of [[Framsburg]] (named after Frumgar's son [[Fram]]) between the Langwell and the Greylin.<ref>{{UT
column7: Cirion}}, (ii) ''The Ride of Eorl''</ref> The Éothéod left the vicinity of the Langwell in {{TA
column8: 2510}} when they became the [[Rohirrim]], settling in [[Rohan]].<ref name="TA"/>
